trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents the Hebrew calendar.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx x 000$xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x 0$xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xx x 000$xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x 0$xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

In a set operation, the Hebrew calendar year value is less than 5343 but is not 99, or the year value is greater than 5999.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx x xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0000 xxx xx xxx 00$ xx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0000.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nmonths is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx $000$000 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 000$000.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 13 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the number of days in the specified year in the specified era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of days in the specified year in the specified era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A year.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
The return value is 7 if the year and era parameters specify a leap year, or 0 if the year is not a leap year.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx 0 xx xxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxx xxxx$ xx 0 xx xxx xxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the number of months in the specified year in the specified era.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
The return value is either 12 in a common year, or 13 in a leap year.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx 00 xx x xxxxxx xxxx$ xx 00 xx x xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx x xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 13 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 30 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx x xxxx xxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nyear, month, day, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$$ $xx$xxxxx$$xx$$ $xx$xxx$$xx$$ xx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified month in the specified year in the specified era is a leap month.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx x xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 13 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the specified month is a leap month; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nyear, month, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$$ $xx$xxxxx$$xx$$ xx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx x xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nyear or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 13 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 1 to 30 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 00 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 000 xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Hebrew calendar year from 5343 through 5999.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 0$xxxxx xxxx xxxx 0 xxxxxxx 00$ xx x 0$xxxxx Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx 0000 xxxxxxx 0000.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

If the year parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx x 0$xxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx 0$xxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the year parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged year parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx x 0$xxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
